'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
This small estate is the home of Rinco, recently pummeled by an aumaua.

==Points of interest==
* This small house is filled with minor loot you can take with impunity, except in the master's bedroom.

==Characters==
* [[Rinco]]
* [[Torri]], Rinco's son.
